revised_title: Reflexion, Transmission, and Radiation Properties of Dielectric Slabs
tldr: The article investigates the reflexion, transmission, and radiation properties of dielectric slabs when a transverse magnetic travelling wave encounters an abrupt change in slab thickness. The author formulates the problem and presents a quasistatic solution for the inner region of the slab. The study also explores the effective boundary conditions for thin slabs and provides a method to determine the reflexion and transmission constants in the long wave asymptotic limit.
